data.name: Requiem Of Science
data.detailed_description:
Requiem Of Science is a free Sci-Fi modification for Half-Life 2: Episode 2.

Plot:

Requiem Of Science takes place a year before the events of Half-Life 2, but they have no plot overlaps. Don't expect big revelations.

Gameplay:

Gameplay similar to the gameplay of Half-Life 2, but with some changes (if you put all cards on the table it won't be interesting). These changes are not about the overall balance of the game, but about the unusual narrative.

IMPORTANT:

The game is not canon, although it does not cancel the events of other games in the universe. The game has little contact with the events of Half-Life. So do not complain to the author about this.

Key options:



- 2 hours of playing time

- 12 levels (3 chapters)

- Charismatic protagonist Genry Freedom

- Voice acting

- Unusual experience from modification
